duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate large antibody libraries for display technologies and perform emulsion PCR and DNA prep for subcloning of libraries or for single constructs.

Design primers, troubleshoot Sanger sequencing, analyze and align sequences, transfect, express, and purify antibodies in small scale, and characterize antibodies for affinity using BLI, epitope binning and binding in ELISA.
Run lab automation for high-throughput assays and coordinate with automation team. Draft, execute and record experiments in a timely manner and maintain an excellent laboratory notebook.
Troubleshoot, optimize and execute experiments independently. Work independently and as part of a team. Participate in the advancement of pipeline projects and further technological innovations.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in molecular biology or other related discipline with 5+ years experience OR M.S. in molecular biology or other related discipline with 2+ years experience
